'''Babak''' is a [[shop]] [[NPC]] found in [[Port Ormos]], [[Sumeru]] that sells [[Local Specialties]].

The stock refreshes every 3 days.

==Shop==
{{Shop/Header|vendor=Babak|note=Refreshes|total=1}}
{{Shop|Philanemo Mushroom|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop|Dandelion Seed|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop|Violetgrass|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop|Qingxin|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop|Naku Weed|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop|Sango Pearl|1,000|5|note=Every 3 Days|total=1}}
{{Shop/Footer|note=&#32;|total=30,000}}
Inazuman local specialties will only be sold after completing {{Quest|Transient Dreams}}.

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Babak:''' Welcome to my shop.
:{{DIcon|Shop}} Buy something.
::'''Babak:''' These are all genuine imports. Take your time to choose from our selection.
:;(Opens the Shop menu)
:{{DIcon}} This place is...
::'''Babak:''' This is the largest imported goods shop in Port Ormos. It is under the direct management of the Akademiya.
::'''Babak:''' I am a researcher, and the shop manager.
::'''Babak:''' There are a lot of tax exemptions due to official guarantees. So please be assured that these foreign goods are reasonably priced.
::'''Babak:''' It also discourages smuggling in some way.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Babak:''' Take care.
{{Dialogue End}}
